title: Soil Analysis Form
subtitle: Enter soil analysis data for plant recommendations
selectField: Select a field to see details
selectFieldDesc: Choose any field from the left sidebar to configure it
temperatureImportance: Soil temperature affects plant growth and nutrient absorption. It helps determine the best planting time and crop selection.
humidityImportance: Air humidity influences plant transpiration and disease development. It's crucial for irrigation planning.
moistureImportance: Soil moisture content determines irrigation needs and affects root development and nutrient availability.
soilTypeImportance: Soil type affects water retention, nutrient availability, and plant root development. It's essential for crop selection.
nitrogenImportance: Nitrogen is crucial for leaf growth and chlorophyll production. It's a primary nutrient for plant development.
potassiumImportance: Potassium helps with disease resistance, drought tolerance, and fruit quality. It's essential for overall plant health.
phosphorousImportance: Phosphorous is vital for root development, flowering, and seed formation. It's crucial for plant reproduction.
fertilizerImportance: Fertilizer selection depends on soil nutrient deficiencies and crop requirements. It ensures optimal plant nutrition.
diseaseImportance: Disease identification helps in selecting appropriate treatment methods and preventing crop loss.
